summary: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo.
cast: Nathan Baesel|Angela Goethals|Robert Englund|Scott Wilson|Zelda Rubinstein|Bridgett Newton|Kate Miner|Ben Pace|Britain Spellings|Hart Turner|Krissy Carlson|Travis Zariwny|Teo Gomez|Matt Bolt|Jenafer Brown|Kane Hodder|Mia Butler|Morgan Kitzmiller|Hannah Rader|Scott Glosserman|Steve Kaminsky|Tommy Peters|Susan Spencer|Anthony Forsyth|Jordan Noce|Alex Revan|Dianna St. Hilaire
keywords: serial killer|masked killer|film crew|virginity|reverse cowboy sex position
title: Detrás de la máscara: el encumbramiento de Leslie Vernon
